title: Aluminum
desc:
Post 367
*This must always be pronounced the British way. because its funny*
- Grab the nearest soda and melt it down into a cool looking puck of aluminum. Keep this puck of aluminum
- At any point in the game, after someone lays down a card, throw the puck of aluminum at them. They must pick the card back up and play a different card.
- If they dont have another playable card, when they draw they may not play another card. Their next turn will also be skipped.
